title: Mussel, pumpkin and saffron soup
description: This smooth, luxurious and flavoursome soup is perfect as a wintry pick-me-up. It is also ideal for freezing.For this recipe you will need a food processor or a stick blender.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz mussels (rinsed, de-bearded, discard any mussels that do not close tightly when tapped)
500g/1lb 2oz pumpkin, peeled, seeds removed, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 tbsp red-veined sorrel cress or chopped fresh herbs, to garnish (optional)
